item.title: By: Amit Patel
item.dc:creator: Amit Patel
item.description:
These are great — thanks for sharing!
The percolation model made me wonder if there was a chart showing the percentage porousness vs. probability of percolation, and I found it looks like an s-curve (chart found on http://www2.imperial.ac.uk/~mgastner/percolation/percolation.html)
The segregation model could be useful for simulation games or generating nice textures.
(p.s. the on the segregation model page has a typo)
item.content:encoded:
These are great — thanks for sharing!

The percolation model made me wonder if there was a chart showing the percentage porousness vs. probability of percolation, and I found it looks like an s-curve (chart found on http://www2.imperial.ac.uk/~mgastner/percolation/percolation.html)

The segregation model could be useful for simulation games or generating nice textures.

(p.s. the on the segregation model page has a typo)
